message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for a special price of $150. It's a great value and I think you'll really enjoy it!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $80. Can you meet me halfway?

I understand you're looking to get a good deal, Bob. I'm willing to compromise, but I need to make sure I get a fair price for the product. How about we meet at $110? It's still a great value, and I'm willing to give you a discount from my original price.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $105? That's the best I can do.

I understand you're trying to stretch your budget, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. How about we meet at $115? It's still a bit above your original offer, but I'm willing to give you a good deal. This is my final offer, so I hope you can meet me in the middle.

I appreciate your willingness to make one more concession, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $100 and $115, which would be $107.50. That's the best I can do.

I understand you're really trying to get a good deal, Bob. However, I've already compromised a lot, and I need to make sure I get a fair price for the product. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $110 and $115, which would be $112.50. That's the best I can do.
